data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_474cea36a4bfdc7bf7d94530853a99b2.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Every 6s, the Noumenon Energy Core grants a 20<font color="26e407"> (+2.5% Total HP)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+20% Total Magic Power)</font> shield to Lolita and nearby allied heroes, and an extra shield after a skill or the Ultimate is cast. This shield can stack up to 3 times and lasts 30s.

Lolita dashes in the target direction. Her next Basic Attack within 4s will perform a short dash to the target, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and stunning them for 0.5s. This damage is doubled against Minions.

Lolita raises her shield and reflects all incoming ranged Basic Attacks and <font color="a6aafb">Projectiles</font> in the direction of the shield for 3s. The shield will break after taking 1000<font color="26e407"> (+15% Total HP)</font> damage.

The damage and effects from the Unique Passives of an attacker's equipment will not apply to the shield and will not be reflected. This skill can be interrupted by high level control effects.

Lolita begins charging for 2s while slowing enemies in a fan-shaped area by 50%. When the charging is complete or is stopped, Lolita slams her hammer on the ground, dealing up to 500<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the area and stunning them for up to 2s (the damage and stun duration are based on the charge time).

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Lolita immediately stops charging and slams her hammer on the ground.

data.name: Lolita

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: Balanced Movement Speed and Defense, good sustain and CC.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+12% Healing Effect
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+6% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by <%Num1> for <Num2>s.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1:
Conceal: <font color="ffe63c">Blessing:</font> Continue to gain Gold (limit: 1500) through Roaming Equipment to keep enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Conceal</font>(current: <font color="ffe63c"> (+1 Roaming Gold)</font>)!
Active: Nearby allied heroes enter Camouflage State and their Movement Speed increases by <font color="ffe63c"> (+0.04 Roaming Gold)</font>% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage ends this state.
equiplist.equipskill2: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill6: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Conceal: <font color="ffe63c">Blessing:</font> Continue to gain Gold (limit: 1500) through Roaming Equipment to keep enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Conceal</font>(current: <font color="ffe63c"> (+1 Roaming Gold)</font>)!
Active: Nearby allied heroes enter Camouflage State and their Movement Speed increases by <font color="ffe63c"> (+0.04 Roaming Gold)</font>% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage ends this state.
Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equiptips:
+12% Healing Effect
+60 Magic Power
+300 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+850 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Physical Defense
+20 Extra Magic Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+920 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Physical Defense
+4 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: KUYAKEN
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Member of the Eruditio Rangers and protector of the Leviathan workshop.

assist.desc: Due to her powerful defensive and CC abilities, Lolita is great at protecting Marksmen like Hanabi and Layla.

strong.desc: Lolita's shield makes her strong against heroes who rely on projectiles and ranged skills, such as Kimmy and Cyclops.

weak.desc: Lolita is countered by melee heroes with high burst damage like Ling and Paquito.
